title: ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: OSError: [WinError 193] %1 is not a valid Win32 application

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
I am getting the following error while installing

`pip install -U TTS`

The error:

```

    Installing build dependencies ... done
          Getting requirements to build wheel ... error
          ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
           command: 'c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\python.exe' 'c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\site-packages\pip\_vendor\pep517\in_process\_in_process.py' get_requires_for_build_wheel 'C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\tmplpj2yzsa'
               cwd: C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-v1kl_oj9\tts_591535616eca4e21bd223d0eb734e427
          Complete output (24 lines):
          Traceback (most recent call last):
            File "c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\site-packages\pip\_vendor\pep517\in_process\_in_process.py", line 280, in <module>
              main()
            File "c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\site-packages\pip\_vendor\pep517\in_process\_in_process.py", line 263, in main
              json_out['return_val'] = hook(**hook_input['kwargs'])
            File "c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\site-packages\pip\_vendor\pep517\in_process\_in_process.py", line 114, in get_requires_for_build_wheel
              return hook(config_settings)
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\setuptools\build_meta.py", line 154, in get_requires_for_build_wheel
              return self._get_build_requires(
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\setuptools\build_meta.py", line 135, in _get_build_requires
              self.run_setup()
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\setuptools\build_meta.py", line 258, in run_setup
              super(_BuildMetaLegacyBackend,
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\setuptools\build_meta.py", line 150, in run_setup
              exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'), locals())
            File "setup.py", line 8, in <module>
              import numpy
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\numpy\__init__.py", line 138, in <module>
              from . import _distributor_init
            File "C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-build-env-sengh4fq\overlay\Lib\site-packages\numpy\_distributor_init.py", line 26, in <module>
              WinDLL(os.path.abspath(filename))
            File "c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\ctypes\__init__.py", line 369, in __init__
              self._handle = _dlopen(self._name, mode)
          OSError: [WinError 193] %1 is not a valid Win32 application
          ----------------------------------------
        WARNING: Discarding https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/5a/64/8ae558bf917e46f8cb908fec4953500fb95f3414369d36a56d882907ab78/TTS-0.1.2.tar.gz#sha256=a89ca15853b4db480762d84a90275b9231953c7f4865c6eb6fc1161621a0b90c (from https://pypi.org/simple/tts/) (requires-python:>=3.6.0, <3.10). Command errored out with exit status 1: 'c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\python.exe' 'c:\users\hp\.pyenv\pyenv-win\versions\3.8.0\lib\site-packages\pip\_vendor\pep517\in_process\_in_process.py' get_requires_for_build_wheel 'C:\Users\hp\AppData\Local\Temp\tmplpj2yzsa' Check the logs for full command output.


```


My `pip` version is  `21.1.3`
